A. A) The background score enhances the atmosphere by contrasting with silence.
B. B) Silence is a characteristic of the vacuum of space.
C. C) The background score contributes to the emotional impact of scenes set in space.
D. D) The vacuum of space is a location that lacks air or gaseous matter.
Correct Answer: A) The background score enhances the atmosphere by contrasting with silence., B) Silence is a characteristic of the vacuum of space., C) The background score contributes to the emotional impact of scenes set in space., D) The vacuum of space is a location that lacks air or gaseous matter.
